skills.name: Anchor Hook
skills.description: Swiggins hurls Homboldt forward, and grapples towards whatever he hits. If you thought getting hit by an anchor is bad, wait for the iron-clad squid that's coming after it!

upgrades.name: Flying Fish Compass
upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of anchor hook  In the winter they point south, in the summer they point north, easy!

upgrades.name: Blue Heart Medal
upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of anchor hook  Draw me like one of your French girls.

upgrades.name: Mobile Periscope
upgrades.description: Increases the range of anchor hook  Penguins on iceplanet Rill use these to find flying fish.

upgrades.name: Treasure Lottery Map
upgrades.description: Enables a shield when hitting an enemy Awesomenaut with anchor hook.  Do you have what it takes to find the treasure? This months treasure jackpot is 1.4 million Solar!

upgrades.name: Kraken Statue
upgrades.description: Increases the stun duration on anchor hook  Resembles Kewlu the ancient one, ruler of the flying seas on Okeanos.

upgrades.name: Ancient Octant
upgrades.description: Makes anchor hook do damage in an area whn hitting an enemy Awesomenaut.  The must have hipster item in sea warfare.

skills.name: Anchor Swing/Ink Spray
skills.description: Admiral Swiggins carries his trustworthy anchor Homboldt anywhere. Quite handy for smacking people on the head with! Especially when they fail to pay a highborn squid admiral his properly earned respect!

upgrades.name: Aquarium Pump
upgrades.description: Increases the attackspeed of anchor swing and ink spray  For deepsea fish tanks.

upgrades.name: Energized Hook
upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of anchor swing and ink spray  Makes your fish swing!

upgrades.name: Krill Biscuits
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed when not holding Homboldt.  Twist, lick and puke!

upgrades.name: Not Seeweed
upgrades.description: Adds a blinding effect to ink spray  It isn't.

upgrades.name: Royal Toy Castle
upgrades.description: You gain a damage-reducing shield when not holding Homboldt  Resembles the sunken castle Windsor.

upgrades.name: Pool Boy
upgrades.description: Doubles the damage of the next anchor swing and ink spray when switching between weapons  Comes with denim cut-off shorts.

skills.name: Drop Anchor
skills.description: Swiggins throws Homboldt in an arch. If it hits an enemy Awesomenaut, it will be chained to homboldt for a couple of seconds. The anchor can be destroyed. Now that's anchor management!

upgrades.name: Bovinian Skimmed Milk
upgrades.description: Enemies caught by the chain will receive extra damage.  Can also be used as car paint.

upgrades.name: Pneumatic Spoon
upgrades.description: When the chain breaks the caught enemy will receive extra damage  Creates a little hurricane in your cup!

upgrades.name: Alien Sweetener
upgrades.description: Increases the base health of Homboldt  That just kicks it up a little bit!

upgrades.name: Palladium Teabag Chain
upgrades.description: Increases the duration of the chain  No more rusty tea!

upgrades.name: Magnetic Anchor
upgrades.description: Adds a damage over time effect to drop anchor  Clean the sea of mines and spiky objects!

upgrades.name: Double Glazed Royal Porcelain
upgrades.description: Slows chained enemy after the chain breaks.  "Property of the Bouquet residence."

skills.name: Ink Propulsion
skills.description: Who said tentacles are only good for swimming in a weird manner? The admiral has no issues whatsoever with manouvering ground based obstacles. Swiggins can also perform a hovering technique by propelling himself upward with ink squirts. Quite splendid.

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.name: Barrier Magazine
upgrades.description: Provides a damage absorbing shield.  Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.

upgrades.name: Piggy Bank
upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.

upgrades.name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
upgrades.description: Reduces the effect of all debuffs  "LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"

skills.name: Evil Eye
skills.description: Unleash your third eye. The evil eye is more effective the less health you have.

upgrades.name: Fresh Scrubs
upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of evil eye  Nuclear steamed to remove any alien bits and blood.

upgrades.name: Toothbrush Shank
upgrades.description: Increases damage of evil eye  Game rules

upgrades.name: Fake Family Pictures
upgrades.description: Reduces the amount of missing health needed per evil eye stage  For those depressing dark moments when you need a family smile.

upgrades.name: Biter Mask
upgrades.description: Increases the slow effect of evil eye  Good against braineaters.

upgrades.name: Jail Food
upgrades.description: Adds a damage over time effect to evil eye  Today's deal 50% off! (best before August 3521)

upgrades.name: Dummy Prisoner
upgrades.description: Increases the range and projectile speed of evil eye  ATTENTION! When bought, the vending machine will warn the authorities that you might be planning an escape!

skills.name: Chain Whack
skills.description: Ayla swings the lock on her chain

upgrades.name: Thief Tools
upgrades.description: Increases attack speed of chain whack  Opens many locks as well as canned food.

upgrades.name: Hungry Zurian
upgrades.description: Increases the lifesteal effect to chain whack.  Zurians are a tough species, their hunger for metals makes them perfect for junkyard work.

upgrades.name: Explosive Neckband
upgrades.description: Increases base damage of chain whack  Let things escalate quickly!

upgrades.name: Prison Guard Keys
upgrades.description: Enemies hit by Chain Whack deal less damage.  Stealthly stolen from a Kremzon prison guard.

upgrades.name: Ion Blowtorch
upgrades.description: Increaes damage of chain whack when enemy Awesomenauts with less than 45% HP are near.  Crème brûlée anyone?

upgrades.name: Sonic Listening Device
upgrades.description: Mark critters to let them drop more health  Can you hear the Solar bubble?

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Toggle rage mode on/off making Ayla float, and deal heavy damage

upgrades.name: Angry Drawings
upgrades.description: Increases damage of rage  "Don't look.. or it takes you!"

upgrades.name: Rip-Apart Bear
upgrades.description: Reduces the base damage inflicted upon yourself with rage.  So cute! You want to kill him!

upgrades.name: Neon Jumping Rope
upgrades.description: Increases the size of rage  Increase you skills, up to lightspeed.

upgrades.name: Blue Three-Wheeler
upgrades.description: Increases your movement speed while enraged.  Here's Danny!

upgrades.name: Rubberband Ball
upgrades.description: Ayla will leave a blood trail which speed up her allies.  Bounce right back into action!

upgrades.name: Fiery Jawbreakers
upgrades.description: When enabling rage after using evil eye you will pull enemies towards you.  New flavors

skills.name: Hop Skip
skills.description: Ayla's favored mode of transportation is the ancient art of hop skipping. Constantly using this natural force of propulsion, her resulting muscles allow her stubby little legs to propel her into the great (depending on the current planet) blue yonder!

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.name: Solar Krab Burgers
upgrades.description: Solar coins will heal you  This popular underwater fast food, makes your stomach resistant to solar.

upgrades.name: Piggy Bank
upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.

upgrades.name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
upgrades.description: Reduces the effect of all debuffs  "LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"

skills.name: Sticky Bomb/Nitro Boost
skills.description: Throw a sticky bomb that attaches to enemies and walls and detonates after a few seconds. While on your bike, this skill becomes nitro boost, which grants a movement speed boost for a brief period of time.

upgrades.name: Krokk License To Kill
upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of sticky bomb against enemy Awesomenauts.  You don't mess with the Krokk.

upgrades.name: Secret Krokk Mission Brief
upgrades.description: Causes an enemy to be slowed while a sticky bomb is stuck to them.  50% OFF! It has already self destructed.

upgrades.name: Zork Industries Share Certificate
upgrades.description: Increases bomb size and explosion size of sticky bomb.  Whoever owns this, owns half of Zork Industries.

upgrades.name: Four-Eye Visor
upgrades.description: Adds a damage over time effect to every enemy within the bomb's range outline.  Easily adjustable for up to four eyes and the glasses automatically darken when getting too close to the sun.

upgrades.name: Black Mail
upgrades.description: Makes the sticky bomb remain sticky when on the ground.  Contains sensitive secret information on Blabl Zork.

upgrades.name: Trick-Up-Your-Sleeve
upgrades.description: Makes sticky bomb drop one smaller bomb while stuck to an enemy.  An explosive surprise for when you are caught cheating in a game of poker.

skills.name: Double Pistol/Bike Blaster
skills.description: Shoot two successive shots which deal damage. When on the bike, this becomes bike blaster, a directional shot.

upgrades.name: The Koi-Robbers
upgrades.description: Makes your double pistol and bike blaster shots pierce through one enemy allowing you to hit an additional target.  WANTED for stealing the Kullinan Koi. The aquatic duo was last seen on Okeanos... they do look familiar.

upgrades.name: Matt Parasite Roid
upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of your double pistol and bike blaster shots.  Some other female bounty hunter is also after this head.

upgrades.name: Team Toddletron
upgrades.description: Increases the range of Double Pistol and Bike Blaster bullets.  WANTED for illegal streetfighting on Calias.

upgrades.name: One Armed Chameleon
upgrades.description: Makes the first next double pistol shot after dismounting your bike or after throwing sticky bomb a strong shot that has increased range and deals more damage.  WANTED DEAD OR ALIVE! By order of the Kremzon empire.

upgrades.name: Blabl Zork
upgrades.description: Increases the attack speed of double pistol after attaching a sticky bomb to someone.  Note from management

upgrades.name: The Time Slipper
upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of sticky bomb for every shot that hits.  WANTED for illegal time travel. Please call 555-KROKK if you recognize this slipper.

skills.name: Hyper Bike/Turret
skills.description: Step on your bike to drive into combat with increased speed and a directional shot. Use the skill again to deploy your bike as a rapid shooting turret. Hold the skill button to either remote destroy your turret or mount it again when close. While on the bike your other skill becomes nitro boost.

upgrades.name: 12th Gear
upgrades.description: Increases base damage of the turret shot.  The gear you didn't know you needed before.

upgrades.name: Alien-Repellent Varnish
upgrades.description: Adds a damage absorbing shield to your turret when standing within its range.  99% garanteed to keep the bike-stealing aliens away.

upgrades.name: Neon Nitro Muffler
upgrades.description: Adds an exhaust flame burst to bike when starting Nitro Boost.  They will hear you coming from light years away!

upgrades.name: BOOM Gas
upgrades.description: Causes a damaging explosion when manually detonating your bike. Also halves the cooldown of the manual detonation.  Cheap AND highly flammable. Available at your local space gas station.

upgrades.name: Anti-Zork Windscreen Wipers
upgrades.description: Increases the movement speed bonus of nitro boost.  Perfect for wiping (holo)cats off your windscreen.

upgrades.name: Retracting-Spikes Fender
upgrades.description: Adds a damaging knockback effect to the front of your bike when using nitro boost. Hits each target only once.  Quickly gets rid of everything and everyone in your way.

skills.name: Dramatic Entrance High Jump/Hyper Bike Hover
skills.description: Dramatic Entrance High Jump when on foot. Hovers around when on his bike.

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
upgrades.description: Reduces the effect of all debuffs  "LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"

upgrades.name: Piggy Bank
upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.

upgrades.name: Overdrive Gear
upgrades.description: Reduces the cooldown of all your skills.  Let's put it into Overdrive!

skills.name: Vacuum Bite
skills.description: Being a giant robot requires a lot of energy. Luckily, Clunk has a powerful set of metal jaws that allow him to take a bite out of almost everything. His iron stomach takes whatever comes in, and quickly converts it to raw health.

upgrades.name: Quick'n Cleaner
upgrades.description: Increases lifesteal and damage of vacuum bite.  Got your fine shirt covered in hitpoints? Try Quick 'n Cleaner!

upgrades.name: Medical Pump
upgrades.description: Adds health to your maximum health for every successful bite. This health is removed upon death.  Clean up with surgical precision.

upgrades.name: Screamer Engine
upgrades.description: Vacuum bite will ensnare enemies.  WHAT ARE YOU SAYING!?! I CAN'T HEAR YOU!

upgrades.name: Multi Hose
upgrades.description: Your bite will affect additional nearby enemies.  For robo-maid model 34-Y or models with same amount of arms.

upgrades.name: The Suckanator Power 9000 Cleaner
upgrades.description: Increases lifesteal and damage of vacuum bite.  Free coupon inside for a Nurian ants facial.

upgrades.name: Power Converter
upgrades.description: Get an adittional heal over time whenever you bite an enemy.  Makes cleaning up a walk in the park.

skills.name: Missiles
skills.description: Slow-loading but very powerful: Clunks' missiles are very useful to get rid of obstructions when he just wants to blow up in someone's face.

upgrades.name: Fragmenting Shells
upgrades.description: Makes missiles do damage in an area upon hitting an enemy target.  Anti bugs, rodents and trucks.

upgrades.name: Free Flight Fins
upgrades.description: Reduces cooldown on missile shot and increases missile speed.  Faster deploying, faster destroying.

upgrades.name: Double Missile
upgrades.description: Increases the damage of all missiles.  Keep away from children and trigger happy Kremzons.

upgrades.name: The Juggernaut "Fat Pete"
upgrades.description: Adds a giant missile to your launch string.  Property of Earth's Liberation Front. Made in 2991

upgrades.name: Improved Homing Sensor
upgrades.description: Makes your missiles better at following enemies.  Pow! Right in the kisser.

upgrades.name: Salvo Value Pack
upgrades.description: Doubles the next shot missile after exploding or performing a vacuum bite.  WARNING!

skills.name: Explode
skills.description: Clunk was designed to be a suicide attacker, later fitted with armor powerful enough to survive his own explosion. Clunk now happily takes a bit of damage to blow away his enemies!

upgrades.name: Thermonuclear Cleaner
upgrades.description: Increases base damage of explode against enemy Awesomenauts.  Clean any room in one big swipe!

upgrades.name: Titanium Hard Hat
upgrades.description: Reduce the damage you inflict upon yourself when using explode.  Approved Calias mining equipment. Safety first.

upgrades.name: Grease Lightning Snail
upgrades.description: Slows enemies near you while charging explode.  WARNING

upgrades.name: Blueprints container
upgrades.description: Reduces incoming damage while exploding.  Where does this part go?

upgrades.name: Reactor Cooler
upgrades.description: Reduces cooldown time on explode.  Explosions, so hot right now.

upgrades.name: Universal Charger
upgrades.description: Reduces the charging time of explode.  When you look closely at the jar, you will see thousands of little stars and planets.

skills.name: Jet Boost
skills.description: Similar to white male humans, giant combat robots can't jump. To compensate, Clunk was outfitted with a powerful jet engine that lets him fly for short distances.

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.name: Barrier Magazine
upgrades.description: Provides a damage absorbing shield.  Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.

upgrades.name: Piggy Bank
upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.

upgrades.name: Baby Kuri Mammoth
upgrades.description: Reduces the effect of all debuffs  "LOOK!!! A FLYING ELEPHANT!"

skills.name: Ball Lightning
skills.description: Coco shoots an actual ball of lightning from her hands, which she can detonate at any time while it's traveling through the air. This little bundle of bolts is able to pass through any solid object.

upgrades.name: Voltage Amplifier
upgrades.description: Increases the base damage of ball lightning against enemy Awesomenauts.  like being hit by Thor himself.

upgrades.name: Gyroscopic Dynamo
upgrades.description: Reduces cooldown time on ball lightning.  Turns you on!

upgrades.name: Conducting Gel
upgrades.description: Increases the range of ball lightning.  Greased lightning!

upgrades.name: Thunder Striker
upgrades.description: Increases the knockback effect of ball lightning.  You've been... thunderstruck!

upgrades.name: Flashing Lights
upgrades.description: Adds a blinding effect to ball lightning.  Also works great with picture recording devices.

upgrades.name: Heavenly Fire
upgrades.description: Adds a blaze effect to ball lightning that deals half the normal Blaze damage.  A storm is coming.

skills.name: Shock
skills.description: Coco channels her psycho-electric powers through her unfortunate enemies, frying anything foolish enough to stand in front of her. Machine or mammal, they are all in for a nasty shock.

upgrades.name: Static Gloves
upgrades.description: Increases base damage of Shock attack.  Yes. Bigger IS better!

upgrades.name: Flexible Heat Sinks
upgrades.description: Increases the attack speed of Shock attack.  A combination of thermo infatuation and superconductive aerobics should keep the temperature stable.

upgrades.name: Wetsuit
upgrades.description: Adds a slowing effect to Shock attack.  WARNING

upgrades.name: Power Gloves
upgrades.description: Reduces shocked enemies' damage.  Dominating video play leagues since 2368

upgrades.name: Hoover Hands
upgrades.description: Adds a lifesteal effect to Shock attack.  Hard rubbing no longer necessary.

upgrades.name: Super Conductor
upgrades.description: Adds homing electricity particles to Shock attack.  They'll never know what zapped 'em!

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: Leaving a trail of lightning, Blaze will damage anyone who is foolish enough to step into it. Helpful to get rid of “the man” when he’s persuing you about those unpaid bills.

upgrades.name: Silver Coating
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed during blaze.  One coat only, withstands the four elements.

upgrades.name: Chuck's Board
upgrades.description: Increases base damage of blaze.  With this, you can surf through land!

upgrades.name: Disruptor
upgrades.description: Increases slowing effect of blaze.  For smooth surfing on rough seas.

upgrades.name: Time Travel Turbine
upgrades.description: Increases time blaze stays on the floor.  The board is modified to reach a speed of 88.

upgrades.name: Syphon Disruptor
upgrades.description: Increases shock damage while using blaze.  Far out dude!

upgrades.name: Wave Raiser
upgrades.description: Leaves a longer blaze trail.  Turns calm water into a tsunami, wicked!

skills.name: Ollie
skills.description: Always willing to entertain the crowds and show off her skills, Coco will occasionally do a Front-Flip while soaring through the air.

upgrades.name: Power Pills Turbo
upgrades.description: Increases maximum health.  Insert pill into rear end of digestive tract.

upgrades.name: Med-i'-can
upgrades.description: Automatically regenerate health.  Hello... anyone there? Please get me out of here!!!

upgrades.name: Space Air Max
upgrades.description: Increases movement speed.  Fashionable and Fast.

upgrades.description: Provides a damage absorbing shield.  Free personal shield with this month's edition of The Barrier! Read all about Zork's imperium.

upgrades.description: Gives 100 Solar.  This product was brought to you by Zork industries, exploiting Zurians since 2780.
